page.title: 01Description of the Block
page.content: This D Block contains the greater part of{Crediton}and a large area of surrounding countryside. Through it from east to west runs the main road {(A377)}from Exeter to Barnstaple. Other roads are for the most part narrow lanes. In the south-east corner of the Block there is a{railway}line, running from Exeter to Barnstaple. The {land}around Crediton is very good both for growing crops and pasturing animals. The southern edge of the Block runs through the{Yeo valley.} This is very picturesque but will be spoilt if a decision is made to build a Crediton{by-pass}through it. The{population}is largely concentrated in Crediton, with approximately 6,000 people. Outside of the town there are only a few scattered houses and farmsteads.
